name: GrappleShot
description:
This is a 3d game I'm making with lasers, grappling guns, and   B   E   A   N

LClick to Shoot Lasers, RClick to Grapple.

I made this on mac, so I can't tell you if Windows and Linux work, but they should!

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Mac: Unzip the file, and run the contents, if it says it's from an unidentified developer, press ok, and right click the file and press open.

Windows: Unzip the zip file, run GrappleShot.exe

Linux: Unzip the file, run GrappleShot.x86_64
